name: Aether (itch)
description:
Overview

Aether is an interactive experience in which you manipulaire energy by moving your own body in an astounding visual and sound universe.

This experience is dynamic, allowing the user to move freely in a smooth universe.

Controls

To use Aether, you just have to move your body front to the kinect. It reconize only arms, but you can use your all body to feel the experience.

Reasons of creation

Aether is the final project of our first year of Master's degree at Cnam-Enjmin. We had less than three months to create a complexe experience lasting 10 to 15 minutes.

For this project, we wanted to use the user's hands, to make him interact with Aether through his body.

We also wanted to take risks and enjoy our first year to experience new things. That's how Aether was born :

By the desire of a team that wanted to create an interactive artistic experience rather than a game.

Go into Aether in depth

  • First experience completely thought for the kinect
  • Astounding visual universe
  • Breathtaking sound universe
  • Feeling of freedom
  • Unique experience for everyone
